evidence.source_document: Order Granting Motions for Preliminary Injunctions and Setting Case Management Conferences
evidence.text: the Court GRANTS Plaintiffs’ motions and modifies the terms of the injunction issued on May 14, 2025 as set forth below

evidence.source_document: Order Granting Motions for Preliminary Injunctions and Setting Case Management Conferences
evidence.text: are HEREBY ENJOINED: ... from arresting and incarcerating any of the named Plaintiffs in these cases and similarly situated individuals nationwide pending resolution of these proceedings

extracted.value: pending resolution of these proceedings: nationwide injunction

evidence.source_document: Order Granting Motions for Preliminary Injunctions and Setting Case Management Conferences
evidence.text: Secretary Noem, Acting Director Lyons, and Acting Field Director Becerra, as well as their officers, agents, servants, employees, attorneys, and all other who are in active concert or participation with them are HEREBY ENJOINED: from arresting and incarcerating any of the named Plaintiffs in these cases and similarly situated individuals nationwide pending resolution of these proceedings

extracted.value: from arresting and incarcerating any of the named Plaintiffs in these cases and similarly situated individuals nationwide pending resolution of these proceedings
